info:
The components proposed for financing under the requested periodic financing request 3 (PFR 3) are: 

1.  Road Development Component. This component will comprise civil works of about 40 km of the Uzbekistan Section of CAREC Corridor 2 Road (between Km 315 and Km 355 of A380 highway). Civil works for this component will involve minimal land acquisition of 0.61 hectare (including abandoned and non-operating entities) and will cause minimal involuntary resettlement. It will not create significant environmental impacts. Such civil works are to achieve the four-lane international design standard within the existing right-of-way. In addition to the physical investments, this component will support implementation of Project 3 (and the Investment Program) through providing consulting services on: (i) procurement and environment and social safeguards; and (ii) construction supervision.

2.  Road Sector Sustainability Component. As part of the overall road section sustainability plan under the investment program, the Project 3 will finance the improvement of cross-border facilities at Daut-ata resulting in a shortening of the cross-border processing time. This project will also expand the community development program and institutional capacity.
name: CAREC CORRIDOR 2 ROAD INVESTMENT PROGRAM, TRANCHE 3 (SF)
